short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Each new tab will provide the time in Arabic or in Hindu-Arabic numerals as well as a verse from the Holy Qur'an.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This minimalistic tab saver features both light and dark mode as well as Arabic and Hindu-Arabic numerals.

Muhammad Asad's translation of the Qur'an was used for the project. The background image can be changed by clicking on the bottom right button. To remove it, select a picture, click on the button again, and select "cancel".
